contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Goggia | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gekkonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Gekkoninae]] | genus = '''''Goggia''''' | genus_authority = ''Bauer, Good, & Branch, 1997'' | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = 8 recognized species, ''see article''. }} '''''Goggia''''' ('''Dwarf leaf-toed geckos''') is a [[genus]] of [[gecko]]s, a type of [[lizard]] found mainly in southern [[Africa]]. == Classification of genus ''Goggia'' == *Braack's Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia braacki]]'' *Essex's Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia essexi]]'' *Richtersveld Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia gemmula]]'' *Hewitt's Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia hewitti]]'' *Cedarberg Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia hexapora]]'' *Striped Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia lineata]]'' *Small-scaled Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia microlepidota]]'' * Namaqualand Dwarf Leaf-toed Gecko, ''[[Goggia rupicola]]'' == References == *Bauer, A.M., Good, D.A. & Branch, W.R. (1997). ''The taxonomy of the southern African leaf-toed geckos (Squamata: Gekkonidae), with a review of Old World "Phyllodactylus" and the description of five new genera''. Proc Calif Acad Sci 49 (14) August 27: 470 (447â€“497)(Zoological Record Volume 134) == External links == * [http://www.herpbreeder.com/worldspecies/Sauria/gekkota/goggia.htm ''Goggia'' species] [[Category:Geckos]] [[Category:Reptiles of Africa]]
